name: Rush Clumsy 3d Ninja
description:
This ninja game is a very interesting running game. It is time to get more of the exhilarating running, jumping, turning and sliding. Lets play the most runner game now. Ready to make a ninja for a day and race. In this ninja game you can surf in the ground, jump and acrobatic and more action. Run and escape from the tiger to complete the mission. So, show your kung fu escape running skills and knockdown tiger through running win.

Features:
- Select your favorite ninja
-Escape run with endless super fun escape from tiger
-More addictive amazing scenario
-Beautiful ninja running experience
